summary: The Veterans Health Administration ranks medical centers on overall quality from 1 star to 5 stars. We found that these rankings are based on a performance measurement system that may not effectively measure quality of care. Two previous reviews of VHA's system—one internal VHA review and one review from a private consulting organization—recommended that VHA make significant changes to it, but it has neither assessed...
title: Veterans Health Administration: Past Performance System Recommendations Have Not Been Implemented
